page.shortlink: form layout flow layout settings break property
page.description: Defines the break behavior for the control in the Flow Layout container.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Break]* property defines whether or not a break (or newline) should occur after the control in a Flow Layout container. If the width of this control when combined with the next control exceeds the width of the Flow Layout container, the next control will 'flow' to a new line.
The following options are available for this property:

item.name: None
item.description: Control is placed in-line with the next control.

item.name: After
item.description: Inserts a break after this control.
